tooltip: Select Rauru, Sage of Light, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Rauru focuses on improving the defensive output of your units and buildings.
Allows you to summon Rauru, a defensive hero with powerful magical spells.
Rauru can train Triforce Sentinels, durable melee units that are resistant to magic and can slay Mages.
Buildings automatically gain 25% more Health and have 10 resistance to Siege Damage.
All units gain more Magic and Non-Magic resistence.
